Question
========
During the very first startup, Positron may display several permission or configuration dialogs. What is the recommended action?

Answerlist
----------
* Cancel every prompt and close Positron immediately
* Disable all suggested features to keep the interface minimal
* Approve the prompts so Positron can fully configure itself
* Uninstall Positron and reinstall it in “safe mode”

Solution
========
Accepting the prompts allows Positron to finish its setup and ensures full functionality.
